definition: to grab/to snatch up/variant of 焯[chao1]
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Children like in huangshan pine, 1000 appearance 100 condition, are different.
sentences.chinese: 孩子好像黃山上的松樹，綽約多姿，各有不同。

sentences.english: She is graceful enough to be a dancer.
sentences.chinese: 她風姿綽約，適合當一名舞蹈演員。

sentences.english: She is graceful and enchanting, good to be a dancer.
sentences.chinese: 她綽約多姿，適合當一名舞蹈演員。

sentences.english: Her face is beautiful; her manner is charming; her mouth is full of honeyed words.
sentences.chinese: 她容顏姣好，風姿綽約，滿口甜言蜜語。

sentences.english: In Hangzhou, the Beautiful scenery in a mist looks so charming and graceful .
sentences.chinese: 秀麗的杭州風景，在朦朦細霧中，顯得風姿綽約。

sentences.english: Delicate pavilions were standing on the five-coloured clouds.
sentences.chinese: 樓閣玲瓏五雲起，其中綽約多仙子。
